snippet: The gains continued on Wall Street as positive economic news helped lift shares as the Dow and Standard & Poor’s 500-stock index reached new highs.
abstract: Stocks continue their climb into uncharted territory, racking up fourth week in a row of gains as encouraging economic data prompts investors to buy shares of growth companies.
lead_paragraph: The gains continued on Wall Street as positive economic news helped lift shares as the Dow and Standard & Poor’s 500-stock index reached new highs.

headline.main: Gains for a 4th Week in a Row, and Milestones, Too
headline.print_headline: Gains for a 4th Week in a Row, and Milestones, Too
